entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Atikokan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:19 a.m. EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.6Â°C

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this morning. Snow mixed with ice pellets late this afternoon. Local blowing snow. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early this afternoon. High zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Local blowing snow. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
